channel.title: Vistex Helppp
channel.description: Okay, So I had the idea to turn the Vistex spawn server into a eco server. I'm mostly there. I removed spawn, and the spawn commands. That tabs are organized and useful now. But theres not really a player rights system, so like the commands are really messed up. Easiest way to fix?

item.title: Vistex Helppp
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Use a switch-statement or a set of if-else evaluations, and group the commands into rights categories.

e.g.

[code=java]if (p.getRights() >= 0) {
// all mod commands
}

if (p.getRights() >= 1) {
// all admin commands
}[/code]

Read full topic
